original_text: The king will choose some of your sons to be officers in his army. Some will be leaders of 1,000 soldiers. Others will be leaders of 50 soldiers. Some of your sons will have to plough the king's fields. They will have to cut his crops at harvest time. They will have to make weapons for the king to fight wars. They will have to fix his chariots.
korean_text: 그가 또 너희의 아들들을 천부장과 오십부장을 삼을 것이며 자기 밭을 갈게 하고 자기 추수를 하게 할 것이며 자기 무기와 병거의 장비도 만들게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The king will choose some of your sons
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 너희 아들들 중 몇몇을 택할 것이다

sentences.original_text: to be officers in his army
Some will be leaders of 1,000 soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이들은 천 명의 군사를 이끄는 지도자가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Others will be leaders of 50 soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 이들은 50명의 군사를 이끄는 지도자가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Some of your sons will have to plough the king's fields
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 아들들 중 일부는 왕의 밭을 갈아야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will have to cut his crops at harvest time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 수확할 때에 그의 곡물을 베어야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will have to make weapons for the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 왕을 위해 무기를 만들어야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will have to fix his chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 전차를 수리해야 할 것이다
